Package bukkitrunnablehelper.handlers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConditionalRepeatHandler
    A ConditionalRepeatHandler extends a RepeatableHandler and handles the scheduling of a ConditionalRepeatable class.
    PlannableHandler
    A PlannableHandler is a BukkitRunnable which schedules a Plannable to be timed out after the specified amount of ticks.
    RepeatableHandler
    A RepeatableHandler extends TimeOutableHandler and handles the scheduling of a repeated action.
    TimedRepeatableHandler
    TimedRepeatableHandler extends a RepeatableHandler and handles the scheduling of a TimedRepeatable class.
    TimeOutableHandler
    A TimeOutableHandler class extends BukkitRunnable and handles all classes which are TimeOutable.
